comment: Smart Data Models. GTFS Schema - Agency adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.UrbanMobility/master/GtfsAgency/schema.json

contents.name: addressCountry
contents.comment: The country. For example, Spain

contents.name: addressLocality
contents.comment: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region

contents.name: addressRegion
contents.comment: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country

contents.name: agencyName
contents.comment: Same as GTFS `agency_name`

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: entitySource
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the Entity data as a URL. It shall point to the URL of the original GTFS feed used to generate this Entity

contents.name: language
contents.comment: Same as GTFS `agency_language`. See [GTFS](https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference/#agencytxt)

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: page
contents.comment: Same as GTFS `stop_url`

contents.name: phone
contents.comment: Same as GFTS `agency_phone`

contents.name: postOfficeBoxNumber
contents.comment: The post office box number for PO box addresses. For example, 03578

contents.name: postalCode
contents.comment: The postal code. For example, 24004

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: streetAddress
contents.comment: The street address

contents.name: timezone
contents.comment: Same as GTFS `agency_timezone`. See [GTFS](https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference/#agencytxt)

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
